member.name: T:RPGCore.Packages.MemorySize
member.summary: A simple structure that formats for bytes.

summary.para: Used for loading the content of a compiled package.

remarks.para: Can be used to analyse and modify the content of a project.

summary.para: The project definition for this package.
A collection of all of the resources contained in this package.
An index of the tags contained within this package for performing asset queries.
A directory representing the root of the package.
